author: castagna
msg: An initial changelog, this is done manually copying from different places.
A different approach could be (as other projects do): list JIRA issues closed between releases. For example: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/whirr/trunk/CHANGES.txt
This has also the IMHO good side effect that everything we do goes via JIRA.

author: minfrin
msg: mod_cache_disk: Make sure we check return codes on all writes and attempts
to close, and clean up after ourselves in these cases. PR43589.
